scripts.all:deploy: npm run collection:deploy && npm run community:deploy && npm run relation:container:deploy && npm run resource:deploy && npm run tag:deploy && npm run user:deploy && npm run relation:ownership:deploy
scripts.all:offline: npm run collection:offline & npm run community:offline & npm run relation:container:offline & npm run resource:offline & npm run tag:offline & npm run user:offline & npm run relation:ownership:offline
scripts.all:test: npm run collection:test && npm run community:test && npm run relation:container:test && npm run resource:test && npm run tag:test && npm run user:test && npm run relation:ownership:test
scripts.relation:container:deploy: npm run relation:container:collection-resource:deploy && npm run relation:container:collection-collection:deploy && npm run relation:container:community-user:deploy
scripts.relation:container:offline: npm run relation:container:collection-resource:offline & npm run relation:container:collection-collection:offline & npm run relation:container:community-user:offline
scripts.relation:container:test: npm run relation:container:collection-resource:test && npm run relation:container:collection-collection:test && npm run relation:container:community-user:test
scripts.relation:ownership:deploy: npm run relation:ownership:community-resource:deploy && npm run relation:ownership:community-resource:deploy && npm run relation:ownership:community-tag:deploy && npm run relation:ownership:user-collection:deploy && npm run relation:ownership:user-community:deploy && npm run relation:ownership:user-resource:deploy && npm run relation:ownership:user-tag:deploy && npm run relation:ownership:community-collection:deploy
scripts.relation:ownership:offline: npm run relation:ownership:community-resource:offline & npm run relation:ownership:community-tag:offline & npm run relation:ownership:user-collection:offline & npm run relation:ownership:user-community:offline & npm run relation:ownership:user-resource:offline & npm run relation:ownership:user-tag:offline & npm run relation:ownership:community-collection:offline
scripts.relation:ownership:test: npm run relation:ownership:community-resource:test && npm run relation:ownership:community-resource:test && npm run relation:ownership:community-tag:test && npm run relation:ownership:user-collection:test && npm run relation:ownership:user-community:test && npm run relation:ownership:user-resource:test && npm run relation:ownership:user-tag:test && npm run relation:ownership:community-collection:test
scripts.database:clean: sudo docker stop nrcanresourcetestdb && sudo docker rm nrcanresourcetestdb
scripts.database:offline: sudo docker run -p 3306:3306 --name nrcanresourcetestdb -e MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD=root -e MYSQL_DATABASE=test -e MYSQL_USER=root -d mysql:5
